contentTypes.infographics: 1000x1500 vertical Format with clear typography, high contrast, and brand-consistent colors. Include 3-5 data points per pin.
contentTypes.productPhotography: Clean backgrounds, 1000x1500 or 1000x1000 dimensions, Plusieurs angles, lifestyle context, and consistent lighting.
contentTypes.blogThumbnails: Vertical Format with compelling headlines, brand colors, and clear value proposition. Use 2:3 aspect ratio.
contentTypes.recipePins: Step-by-step visuals, final hero shot, ingredient list overlay. 1000x1500 optimal with high food photography Qualité.
contentTypes.diyProjects: Comparaisons avant/après, photos étape par étape, listes de matériaux. Utilisez des images claires et lumineuses.

designGuidelines.textOverlays: Utilisez 60-70 caractères maximum, polices sans serif, taille minimale de 12pt, arrière-plans à fort contraste
designGuidelines.colorPalette: Limitez à 3-4 couleurs, maintenez la cohérence de la marque, testez les ratios de contraste pour l"accessibilité
designGuidelines.composition: Règle des tiers, espace négatif, point focal clair, évitez l"encombrement
designGuidelines.branding: Placement cohérent du logo, couleurs de marque, hiérarchie des polices, style visuel

thumbnailStrategy.faceDetection: Les images avec des visages reçoivent 35% d"engagement en plus. Utilisez des expressions authentiques et le contact visuel.
thumbnailStrategy.colors: Les tons rouge, orange et rose augmentent les clics de 15%. Utilisez des couleurs vives et saturées.
thumbnailStrategy.asymmetry: Une composition légèrement décentrée performe 20% mieux que les images parfaitement centrées.
thumbnailStrategy.contrast: High contrast Images perform better in feeds. Test with grayscale to ensure readability.

timing.bestPostingTimes: 20h-23h, 14h-16h le week-end. L"engagement maximal varie selon le fuseau horaire de l"audience.
timing.seasonalContent: Prévoyez 6-8 semaines à l"avance. Le contenu de vacances performe 40% mieux lorsqu"il est publié tôt.
timing.trendingTopics: Monitor Pinterest Trends Outil. Create content 1-2 weeks before trend peaks.

engagementFactors.multipleImages: Pins with 4-5 Images get 2x more saves than single Images.
engagementFactors.descriptiveAltText: Include 3-5 keywords naturally. Describe Image content and user benefit.
engagementFactors.hashtags: Utilisez 3-5 hashtags pertinents. Mélangez termes généraux (#décoration maison) et spécifiques (#ideeschambrebohème).

ideoRequirements.subtitles: 85 % des utilisateurs regardent sans le son. Incluez des sous-titres intégrés.

ideaPins.storytelling: Arc narratif, progression claire, valeur dans chaque diapositive

videoOptimization.thumbnailGeneration: Créez des miniatures personnalisées à partir de la vidéo. Utilisez l'image la plus captivante.
videoOptimization.editing: Gardez des coupes rapides, ajoutez des superpositions de texte, incluez des éléments de marque.
videoOptimization.length: 15 à 30 secondes optimal. Les 3 premières secondes sont cruciales pour la rétention.

compression.jpgSettings: Qualité 80-85 %, encodage progressif, espace colorimétrique sRGB
compression.pngSettings: Lossless Compression for graphics, reduce color palette where possible
compression.fileSize: Cible < 1 Mo pour les épingles, < 5 Mo pour les miniatures vidéo. Utilisez WebP pour des fichiers 25 % plus petits.

loadingPerformance.lazyLoad: Pinterest utilise automatiquement le chargement différé (lazy load). Optimisez pour le premier affichage.
loadingPerformance.preload: Critical above-fold content. Prioritize hero Images.
loadingPerformance.cdn: Le CDN de Pinterest optimise, mais commencez par des fichiers bien optimisés.

planningWorkflows.batchCreation: Créez 30 à 60 épingles par mois. Utilisez des modèles pour la cohérence.
planningWorkflows.contentPillars: Développez 5 à 7 thèmes de contenu principaux. Maintenez un ratio de valeur/promotion de 80/20.
planningWorkflows.scheduling: Utilisez l'API Pinterest Planner. Espacez les publications de 2 à 4 heures.
planningWorkflows.testing: Testez les formats A/B chaque semaine. Documentez les résultats dans le calendrier de contenu.

faq.question: What's the Meilleur size for Pinterest pins in 2025?
faq.answer: Standard pins work Meilleur at 1000x1500 pixels (2:3 aspect ratio) for optimal display and engagement. Square pins (1000x1000) also perform well for certain content types like products and infographics.

faq.question: How do I optimize Pinterest Images for mobile vs desktop?
faq.answer: Focus on mobile-first Design with 1000x1500 vertical Format. Ensure text is readable on small screens (24pt minimum), use high contrast colors, and test your pins on mobile devices before publishing.

faq.question: What file Format should I use for Pinterest pins?
faq.answer: Use JPG for photographic content with 80-85% quality, PNG for graphics with text, and consider WebP for 25% smaller file sizes with comparable quality. Always keep file sizes under 32MB.

faq.question: How do I create effective Pinterest video thumbnails?
faq.answer: Extract the most engaging frame from your video, add compelling text overlay (under 60 characters), and ensure 1080x1920 dimensions. Include a clear call-to-action and brand elements for consistency.

faq.question: What are the latest Pinterest Image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include authentic imperfection, bold typography overlays, sustainable/earth-tone aesthetics, and 90s nostalgia with vintage filters. Video content continues to dominate, with short-form vertical video leading engagement.

faq.question: What's the Meilleur size for TikTok profile pictures in 2025?
faq.answer: TikTok profile pictures should be 200x200 pixels with high Qualité. Remember they display as circles, so keep important elements away from the edges and ensure your Design works with circular cropping.

faq.question: How do I create effective TikTok video thumbnails?
faq.answer: Choose frames with emotional impact, add compelling text in the upper third, use bright colors, and include faces when possible. Optimize for 1080x1920 pixels and ensure the thumbnail tells a story in 3 seconds.

faq.question: What Image specifications do I need for TikTok ads?
faq.answer: TikTok image ads should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16) or 1080x1080 pixels (1:1) with file sizes under 50MB. Use JPG or PNG formats and ensure high quality for optimal performance.

faq.question: How do I optimize Images for TikTok Stories?
faq.answer: Concevez pour plein écran 1080x1920 pixels, laissez des marges de 10% pour les éléments de l"interface, utilisez du texte lisible et grand, et incluez de l"espace pour les autocollants et sondages interactifs.

faq.question: What are the current TikTok Image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Popular trends include Y2K revival aesthetics, cottagecore reimagined, dark academia, and cyberpunk pop. Neon color palettes are trending for entertainment content, while minimalist earth tones work well for educational and wellness content.

faq.question: What's the Meilleur size for Instagram posts in 2025?
faq.answer: Square posts at 1080x1080 pixels work Meilleur for most content. Portrait posts at 1080x1350 pixels (4:5 ratio) perform well for vertical content, while landscape posts at 1080x566 pixels (1.91:1 ratio) work for horizontal content.

faq.question: How should I size Images for Instagram Stories?
faq.answer: Les Instagram Stories doivent être 1080x1920 pixels (ratio 9:16). Laissez une zone de sécurité de 1080x1420 pixels au centre pour éviter que le contenu important soit couvert par les éléments de l"interface Instagram.

faq.question: What are Instagram Reels cover Photo requirements?
faq.answer: Reels cover Photos should be 1080x1920 pixels with a 9:16 aspect ratio. Use high-Qualité, engaging thumbnails that represent the video content and include branding elements.

faq.question: Comment optimiser les publications carrousel pour Instagram?
faq.answer: Use consistent dimensions (1080x1080 square recommended) for all carousel Images. Maintain a cohesive visual style while telling a story or showcasing different angles/products across the carousel.

faq.question: What are the current Instagram Image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include minimalist maximalism (clean composition with bold elements), authentic realism (unfiltered genuine moments), Numérique art fusion (photography with Numérique elements), and sustainable aesthetics with earth tones and natural contexts.

faq.question: What's the Meilleur size for YouTube thumbnails in 2025?
faq.answer: YouTube thumbnails should be 1280x720 pixels (16:9 aspect ratio) with a minimum of 640x360 pixels. Use high-contrast colors, large readable text (minimum 60pt), and include faces with emotions for 30-40% higher CTR.

faq.question: Comment optimiser les bannières de chaîne YouTube pour tous les appareils?
faq.answer: Create banners at 2560x1440 pixels with critical content in the center safe zone (1546x423 pixels). Test on mobile, desktop, and TV as YouTube displays different portions on each device.

faq.question: What are YouTube Shorts thumbnail requirements?
faq.answer: YouTube Shorts thumbnails should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 vertical format). Create scroll-stopping first frames, use full-screen impact, and optimize for mobile viewing where 70% of YouTube traffic occurs.

faq.question: Comment créer des écrans de fin YouTube efficaces?
faq.answer: Concevez des écrans de fin à 1920x1080 pixels avec des éléments dans la zone de sécurité (85% du cadre avec des marges de 10%). Maximum 4 éléments, chacun 300x300 pixels, positionnés 20-30 secondes avant la fin de la vidéo.

faq.question: What are current YouTube thumbnail trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include minimalist impact Design (clean with bold elements), authentic connection (real, unfiltered moments), Numérique innovation (AR effects and futuristic elements), and nostalgic modern (retro styles with contemporary twists).

faq.question: What's the Meilleur size for Facebook posts in 2025?
faq.answer: Facebook posts work Meilleur at 1200x630 pixels (1.91:1 ratio) for optimal display. Square posts at 1080x1080 pixels also perform well, as do portrait posts at 1080x1350 pixels (4:5 ratio).

faq.question: How do I optimize Facebook cover Photos for all devices?
faq.answer: Upload cover photos at 2048x1152 pixels to ensure quality across devices. Important content should be in the center safe zone (100px margins from edges) as Facebook displays different portions on desktop vs mobile.

faq.question: What are Facebook Marketplace Photo requirements?
faq.answer: Les photos Marketplace doivent être 1200x900 pixels (ratio 4:3) avec un minimum de 800x600 pixels. Utilisez des photos de haute qualité et bien éclairées montrant clairement les produits. Maximum 20 photos par annonce avec une limite de taille de 10 Mo chacune.

faq.question: Comment dimensionner les Facebook Stories pour un engagement optimal?
faq.answer: Les Facebook Stories doivent être 1080x1920 pixels (format vertical 9:16). Laissez une marge de 10% sur les bords pour les éléments de l"interface, utilisez du texte grand et lisible, et incluez des éléments interactifs comme des sondages et des autocollants.

faq.question: What are current Facebook Image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include authentic connection (real, unpolished moments), minimalist professionalism (clean Design with purposeful color use), bold expression (vibrant colors and typography), and sustainable visuals (earth tones and eco-friendly contexts).
